price: Dan tidaklah bermanfaat kepadamu nasihatku jika aku hendak memberi nasihat kepada kamu, sekiranya Allah hendak menyesatkan kamu, Dia adalah Tuhan-mu dan kepada-Nya-lah kamu dikembalikan".
arabic: وَلَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ نُصۡحِيٓ إِنۡ أَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَنصَحَ لَكُمۡ إِن كَانَ ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يُغۡوِيَكُمۡۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yanfaʿukum nuṣ'ḥī in aradttu an anṣaḥa lakum in kāna al-lahu yurīdu an yugh'wiyakum huwa rabbukum wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
